div.p: >>> FACTOR FOLLOW UP SEGMENT TONIGHT.

REALLY NEWED IN THE TRAFFIC SCANDAL STORY.
SO WHY ARE THEY DOING THIS? JOINING US FROM AUSTIN,

YOU KNOW, THEY ARE GETTING LITTLE RATINGS BUMP OVER
THERE BUT AND IT’S SURPRISING BECAUSE IT’S JUST
NIGHT AFTER NIGHT AFTER NIGHT.
THERE IS NOTHING NEW. THEY ARE ON A JIHAD AGAINST
CHRISTIE. WHY?
WHY ARE THEY WASTING ALL THE TIME?
>> WELL, DON’T LOOK JUST AT MSNBC.
THEY ARE THE TOOL. THEY -- LOOK BACK BEHIND

REASONS. ONE IS BECAUSE THEY THINK

HIM DOWN. BY TEARING HIM DOWN THEY

FROM US. THEY ARE DOING IT BECAUSE
THEY CAN. BECAUSE THEY HAVE A WILLING
MEDIA TO HELP THEM. NOT JUST MSNBC.
BUT THIS HAS TAKEN UP A LOT OF ATTENTION IN THE NATIONAL
MEDIA WHICH IS HEADQUARTERED IN NEW YORK.
AND WHICH, SOME OF WHOSE MEMBERS DID NOT LIKE THE
FACT THAT HE WON RE-ELECTION IN A NEARBY STATE BY A BIG
MARGIN AS A REPUBLICAN AND AS A CONSERVATIVE AND SO,
YOU KNOW, THEY CAN AND SO THEY WILL GO AFTER HIM.

AND I UNDERSTAND THAT. AND WE’RE COVERING IT HERE
ON THAT BASIS. BUT THERE ISN’T ANYTHING

SOMETHING IF YOU DON’T CHARGE ME FOR.
THIS BUT, IT SEEMS TO ME THAT THERE IS SOMETHING
PERSONAL. I MEAN, I KNOW THE
DEMOCRATIC PARTY WANTS TO WIN.
ALL POLITICAL PARTIES WANTS TO WIN.
BUT THERE IS A PERSONAL ELEMENT TO THE CHRISTIE
THING THAT I THINK IS ALMOST UNIQUE.

IT’S A DEEP BLUE STATE. CHRISTIE WINS THE GOVERNOR’S

AND THEY SHARE A MIND SET AND FOR THEM IT’S -- LOOK,
